meanings.definition: Having a strong or intoxicating effect on the mind or senses.
meanings.sent1: The headier perfume made her feel dizzy.
meanings.sent2: The headier music at the concert made everyone dance.
meanings.sent3: The headier aroma of the bakery made her crave pastries.
meanings.sent4: The headier atmosphere of the party enveloped her like a warm blanket.
meanings.sent5: The headier spices in the dish awakened her taste buds.

meanings.sent1: The headier roller coaster ride left her breathless.
meanings.sent2: The headier movie kept her on the edge of her seat.
meanings.sent3: The headier game made her heart race with excitement.
meanings.sent4: The headier competition pushed her to perform at her best.
meanings.sent5: The headier adventure filled her with adrenaline.
